basic.description: This lab explores anatomy, development, and morphology and life cycles of  autotrophs and fungi and other osmotrophs.
basic.subject: BOT
basic.title: Plant Biology Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L. Corequisite: BOT 3015.
